General.Name: Planet Based Foods Global Inc
General.Description: Planet Based Foods Global Inc. manufactures and sells vegan meat-analog based products derived from hemp plant proteins. The company offers burgers, crumbles, breakfast sausage patties, and taquitos products. The company also sells products through online. Planet Based Foods Global Inc. is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1055 West Hastings Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 2E9
